column.name: patient_person_id
column.remarks: Important: Patient is either a person or a company, not both

column.name: patient_company_id
column.remarks: One of patient_person_id or patient_company_id has to be NULL

column.name: location_of_therapy
column.remarks: Reference different address if patient is not treated at his/her home address

table.name: full_company
table.viewSql: select `bmp_test`.`company`.`company_id` AS `company_id`,`bmp_test`.`company`.`name` AS `name`,`bmp_test`.`address`.`street` AS `street`,`bmp_test`.`address`.`streetnumber` AS `streetnumber`,`bmp_test`.`address`.`additional_address_line` AS `additional_address_line`,`bmp_test`.`address`.`zip_code` AS `zip_code`,`bmp_test`.`address`.`city` AS `city`,`bmp_test`.`address`.`country_iso` AS `country_iso`,`bmp_test`.`company`.`phone` AS `phone`,`bmp_test`.`company`.`fax` AS `fax`,`bmp_test`.`company`.`website` AS `website`,`bmp_test`.`company`.`information` AS `information`,`bmp_test`.`company`.`person_id` AS `contact_person_id`,concat(`bmp_test`.`person`.`first_name`,' ',`bmp_test`.`person`.`last_name`) AS `contact_person_name` from ((`bmp_test`.`company` left join `bmp_test`.`address` on((`bmp_test`.`company`.`address_id` = `bmp_test`.`address`.`address_id`))) left join `bmp_test`.`person` on(((`bmp_test`.`company`.`address_id` = `bmp_test`.`person`.`address_id`) and (`bmp_test`.`company`.`person_id` = `bmp_test`.`person`.`person_id`) and (`bmp_test`.`company`.`fax` = `bmp_test`.`person`.`fax`) and (`bmp_test`.`company`.`email` = `bmp_test`.`person`.`email`) and (`bmp_test`.`company`.`website` = `bmp_test`.`person`.`website`))))

table.name: full_person
table.viewSql: select `bmp_test`.`person`.`person_id` AS `person_id`,`bmp_test`.`person`.`first_name` AS `first_name`,`bmp_test`.`person`.`last_name` AS `last_name`,`bmp_test`.`person`.`title` AS `title`,`bmp_test`.`form_of_address`.`name` AS `form_of_address`,`bmp_test`.`person`.`birth_date` AS `birth_date`,`bmp_test`.`address`.`street` AS `street`,`bmp_test`.`address`.`streetnumber` AS `streetnumber`,`bmp_test`.`address`.`additional_address_line` AS `additional_address_line`,`bmp_test`.`address`.`zip_code` AS `zip_code`,`bmp_test`.`address`.`city` AS `city`,`bmp_test`.`address`.`country_iso` AS `country_iso`,`bmp_test`.`person`.`phone_private` AS `phone_private`,`bmp_test`.`person`.`phone_business` AS `phone_business`,`bmp_test`.`person`.`phone_mobile` AS `phone_mobile`,`bmp_test`.`person`.`fax` AS `fax`,`bmp_test`.`person`.`email` AS `email`,`bmp_test`.`person`.`website` AS `website`,`bmp_test`.`person`.`gender` AS `gender`,group_concat(`bmp_test`.`person_language`.`language_iso` separator ',') AS `spoken_languages` from (((`bmp_test`.`person` left join `bmp_test`.`form_of_address` on((`bmp_test`.`person`.`form_of_address_id` = `bmp_test`.`form_of_address`.`form_of_address_id`))) left join `bmp_test`.`address` on((`bmp_test`.`person`.`address_id` = `bmp_test`.`address`.`address_id`))) left join `bmp_test`.`person_language` on((`bmp_test`.`person`.`person_id` = `bmp_test`.`person_language`.`person_id`))) group by `bmp_test`.`person`.`person_id`

column.name: office_employee_id
column.remarks: Employee who is processing the matching
